channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Behind the Curtain: Elections jolt Democratic resistance to life
item.description: A half-dozen scattered elections did overnight what President Trump himself couldn't do in 10 months: revitalized the Democratic resistance, instantly...

item.title: How Trump could squeeze Mamdani's NYC agenda
item.description: Democratic socialist Zohran Mamdani basked in his history-making election as New York City's mayor Tuesday, but harsh reality loomed: the wrath of a p...

item.title: "A bad time to be Latino": Pessimism surges in new Axios-Ipsos poll
item.description: Data: Axios/Ipsos poll; Chart: Erin Davis/Axios Visuals Nearly two in three Latinos say it's a bad time to be Latino or Hispanic in the U.S. — a spike...

item.title: AI executives rebuff questions about valuations
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and Palantir CEO Alex Karp both publicly snubbed questions about fundamentals of their companies this week. Why it matters: AI e...

item.title: FAA orders 10% cut in flights at several airports as shutdown drags on
item.description: The Trump administration says the move, which will affect 40 markets, is part of an effort to ease pressure on air traffic controllers.

item.title: House Democrats request interview with former prince Andrew on Epstein
item.description: In a letter, Democrats on the House Oversight Committee asked for Andrew’s help to “understand the full extent of [Epstein’s] criminal operations.”

item.title: Ranking the 2028 Democratic presidential contenders
item.description: There already are a few standouts among Democrats’ potential 2028 candidates, but the long road to the next presidential contest features plenty of da...

item.title: In her own words: Pelosi plans to retire after decades in charge
item.description: In recent weeks, Nancy Pelosi has grown reflective of her time as House speaker. Here are some notable moments she recalled from her 20 years in leade...

item.title: "The Axios Show": Palantir CEO rejects surveillance state fears
item.description: Americans are being monitored more closely by private companies than by government, and should worry about that rather than a new "surveillance state,...

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
